dcterms:description: A global panel database of pandemic policies that provides a normalized measure called the Stringency Index to compare government responses across countries.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Government Response Tracker

dcterms:creator: E. Dong
H. Du
L. Gardner
dcterms:description: An interactive web-based dashboard that tracks COVID-19 cases in real time, providing essential data for understanding the pandemic's progression.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Data Repository

dcterms:creator: Google Mobility
dcterms:description: Reports that capture movement trends over different categories relative to a predefined baseline, helping to understand mobility behavior during the pandemic.
dcterms:title: Google Mobility Reports

dcterms:creator: R. K. Gupta
A. Vishwanath
Y. Yang
dcterms:description: A labeled dataset containing global reactions to COVID-19 on Twitter, with attributes for latent topics, sentiment, and emotions.
dcterms:title: CrystalFeel Twitter dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Abd-Alrazaq
D. Alhuwail
M. Househ

dcterms:description: A study that analyzes the top concerns of Twitter users during the COVID-19 pandemic through an infoveillance approach.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 related Tweets
